message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950000. It's a great deal for you, given the value it holds for your business. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $1000000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $800000.

Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within $1000000. Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to drop my price to $900000, but I can't go any lower. It's still a great deal for you, considering the value it brings to your business. What do you say?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $850000.
